name: Cities: Skylines - Downtown Radio
description: Kick back and relax to the smoothest tunes in town on Downtown Radio, your one-stop-shop for modern lounge music in Cities: Skylines. This channel features 16 original songs with a retro twist, created especially for all the late-night city builders out there. Chill out with DJ Troy Anderson as he takes you through nearly an hour of relaxing tracks in this essential pack.
